post.author: 강경필
post.content:
Ranked among the world's top ten semiconductor equipment manufacturers, KLA-Tencor is hiring Customer Support Engineers in Korea office.

If interested, please forward your resume to niki as the following.

--------------------------
----- Original Message -----

From: Baccam, Niki

Sent: Wednesday, May 11, 2005 2:36 AM

Subject: Job opportunity with KLA-Tencor in Gyunggi-do, Korea

Hello,

KLA-Tencor is looking for Customer Support Engineers to join our Korea office. I like to know if you have friends in the US or Korea that are looking for employment in Gyunggi-do, Korea.  

KLA-Tencor is looking to hire people in the next 2-3 weeks.  Please feel free to forward me your resume if you are interested.  If you are not interested, please feel free to share the job description with someone that’s looking for an employment in Korea.  I apologize for the inconvenience in advance if this email is not of interest to you.

Thank you for your time.

Niki Baccam
University Relations
KLA-Tencor
Phone: 408-875-1784
Email:Niki.Baccam@kla-tencor.com
Fax: 408-678-4766
Toll free: 800-358-6784 x51784
post.title: KLA Tencor: Hiring Customer Support Engineer in Korea office
